name: Wealth Loan Origination Advisor
description: Wealth Loan Origination Advisor scores exposure limits and clears market data; applies decision gates and observability; orchestrates via Risk Engine to lower false positives.

steps.name: Case Intake
steps.description: Collect, validate and normalize exposure limits from Case Management; attach a runId and timestamp for traceability.

steps.name: Draft
steps.description: Execute draft phase for the Reflection pattern: persist interim state, enforce guardrails, and emit structured JSON results.

steps.name: Self-Critique
steps.description: Execute self-critique phase for the Reflection pattern: persist interim state, enforce guardrails, and emit structured JSON results.

steps.name: Limit Control
steps.description: Limit Control across joined datasets; branch on thresholds using decision gates; write metrics (success/error counts) for observability.

steps.name: Portfolio Check
steps.description: Portfolio Check across joined datasets; branch on thresholds using decision gates; write metrics (success/error counts) for observability.

steps.name: Case Management
steps.description: Case Management across joined datasets; branch on thresholds using decision gates; write metrics (success/error counts) for observability.

steps.name: Sanctions Screening
steps.description: Sanctions Screening across joined datasets; branch on thresholds using decision gates; write metrics (success/error counts) for observability.

steps.name: Underwriting
steps.description: Underwriting across joined datasets; branch on thresholds using decision gates; write metrics (success/error counts) for observability.

steps.name: Break Resolution
steps.description: Break Resolution across joined datasets; branch on thresholds using decision gates; write metrics (success/error counts) for observability.

steps.name: Booking
steps.description: Assemble final payload with status, artifacts, KPIs and audit trail; store to CRM; return response JSON for the client.
